Review Text: Great pizza! Thin base and top quality ingredients. The dinning area is small and they don't take bookings so get there early or be prepared to wait a little while. Otherwise call them up to order. They speak English and I picked up my order within 10mins!

Name: FAAM

Name: FAAM
Review Text: We were in Amsterdam for 5 weeks, and we found this awesome place in our first week. We returned 7 times! We are big fans of Italian food, and harsh judges when it comes to a good pizza. Faam's pizzas, staff service, and atmosphere was so, so good. If you're in Amsterdam and love amazing pizza, go here!

Name: FAAM
Review Text: Incredible pizza. One of the best I've ever had.

Name: FAAM
Review Text: Delicious oven baked pizza! They are huge and so tasty - ingredients are higher end when compared to a traditional pizza. Small place, so very cozy.

Name: FAAM
Review Text: Very friendly service and good pizza. Our family of 6 stopped in on a Saturday night when the place was packed. They took good care of us all and we left happy after a long day of travel.

Name: FAAM
Review Text: This place has the best pizza of Amsterdam. It is always busy, and they dont take reservations so you may have to wait for about 20 minutes on a table, but its worth it!

Name: FAAM
Review Text: An unexpected find in one of the more residential areas of Amsterdam. This cozy little place is off the main streets so it can be a bit harder to find. In any case you're not likely to wander in here by accident as a tourist. If you do happen to be here though, it's worth a visit. Staff is friendly and the food is lovely.

Name: FAAM
Review Text: If you are living or staying near and you like good authentic pizza here is the place for you. Decor is nice and the staff are really nice. A must try if your close by!

Name: FAAM
